long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Marvellous Manouvering Meerkat (or MMM from now on) is a meerkat, who appears on every website the user visits. It is a small image of a meerkat which Daniel Harka took a picture of. MMM would like to visit as many websites as possible and explore the web and therefore follows users to every site they visit.
